TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l iː z k ɔː d s ɛ ɹ ɚ æ æ s k ɚ t ə b ɹ ɪ ŋ ð iː z t ɪ ŋ z w ɪ ð h ɚ f ɹ ʌ m ð ə s t ɔːɹ s ɪ k s k uː ŋ z ʌ v f ɹ ɛ ʃ s n oʊ iː ŋ z f aɪ v f ɪ s l æ b s ʌ v l oʊ tʃ iː z n d m eɪ b iː ɐ s n æ k f ɔːɹ h ɚ b ɹ ʌ ð ɚ b ɔː w iː ɔː l s oʊ n iː d ɐ s m ɔː l ɡ l æ s t ɪ k s n æ k æ n d d ɛ b ɪ ɡ ɐ t ɔːɹ f ɔː f ɔːɹ h ɚ k f ɔːɹ ð ə k eɪ z ʃ iː k æ n s k uː p ð iː z t ɪ ŋ z ɪ n t ʊ f ɹ iː ɹ ɪ b æ ɡ z æ n æ n d w iː w ɪ l ɡ oʊ t ə m iː t h ɚ w ɛ n z d eɪ æ t ð æ t f ɹ eɪ s t eɪ ʃ ə n
